title: Fabulous 2,700+ Sqft 4-Bedroom House with Bonus Loft & Upgrades
posting_body: BRAND NEW WOOD FLOORS being installed in every room (bedrooms too).
Pictures coming this week!
Nearly 2,800 Sqft 4-bedroom+Loft house for rent in Silverado Ranch.
Just minutes from large shopping center, Costco, schools, the M Resort Casino and freeway access.
4 bedrooms+Loft, 2.5 bathrooms and a 2-car garage.
Traditional floor plan with formal living/dining room and a separate family room featuring new laminate wood floors,  neutral colors and recessed lighting.
Wonderful gourmet kitchen with island, upgraded cabinets, granite countertops and black appliances.
Laundry room with washer and dryer.
All 4 bedrooms and bonus loft are upstairs and feature new wood floors.
Spacious master suite with walk-in closet and ceiling fans.
Master bath has dual sinks with separate tub and shower.
Spacious guest bedrooms with shared bathroom.
Large backyard with zero maintenance desert landscaping.
Zoned for popular Del Webb Jr and Liberty High schools.
1-year lease minimum.
NO PETS please.
Available now
Rent: $2,650/month
